FuncDef:
The active ptp slot command activates a GTL file for a board.
The undo active ptp slot command deactivates a GTL file for a board.
By default, the GTL file of a board is not activated.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of the board on which the GTL file to be activated.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command is used to activate a GTL file for the board.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
